ResearchProjectDef.label: Automation basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the very basics of automation and mechanisms, the gateway to an industrial colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Machine learning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Teach machines how to improve their abilities by themselves. Unlocks the AI research bench. Also lets you craft drone modules at the robotic machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Goldbach's conjecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Any even integer greater than or equal to 4 can be formed from the sum of 2 prime numbers."\nUnlocks a new array of research projects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum computing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create quantum computers to aid in research projects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Atomic reconstruction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to turn paperclips into raw materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano-materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the atomic reconstructor to create X-Composite and Y-Composite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: edibles synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create foods by manipulating the molecular structure of paperclips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: manufacturables production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to also convert paperclips into items in the "manufactured" category.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI persona production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to fuse weak AI cores to make an AI persona core.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ordo data rummaging
ResearchProjectDef.description: The AI research bench has detected a scrambled radio signal originating from deep within the planet, broadcasting records of the Ordo Historia. Unscramble the signal and search through the records in the hopes of uncovering more technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Riemann hypothesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: ζ(0.5 ± 1/g + π(g) * i) = 0, where g is Graham's number, and where π is the prime counting function.\n\nOrdo Historia, Record {fb640e1a-1021-474b-b4ba-5ffe61bd2649}, Last synced with galactic core 1208YYtp ago

ResearchProjectDef.label: P versus NP
ResearchProjectDef.description: To break RSA encryption, all you need is a cure for cancer.\n\nOrdo Historia, Record {490c3481-b420-4cf9-aa6d-88bcfe651cb0}, Last synced with galactic core 1208YYtp ago

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fermi paradox
ResearchProjectDef.description: Aliens? What aliens? - A totally innocent mechanoid Ordo Historia, Record {43039413-a9ad-436d-99e1-63ec2cd944e5}, First published in the Euterpe Musings (4256CE). Last synced with galactic core 1208YYtp ago

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vanometrics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce vanometric power cells, infinite chemreactors and other archotechnology-grade buildings. Also unlocks the production of Z-Composite at the atomic reconstructor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Archotechnology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to produce computronium to enhance the intelligence of an existing AI persona core.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Psychics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the production of psychic items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: theory of everything
ResearchProjectDef.description: Figure out how this simulation really works by hacking into it.
